data.message: I cannot access the features from the menu button on Android. Nothing is available to see, my Pages, Friends, Groups, Ads Manager, my Interests Lists... I can only see the "Help & Settings" section. Before I was able to access all of them! I have tried all that I could thing of, even login with app passwords or code generator. Can anyone help me please?

replies.message: Hi Reza. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2rpZD7b. Thanks. -William
